contentList.content:
Your Charisma increases by 1.

Gain Expertise in Deception, Persuasion, Intimidation, and Performance Checks.

You have become a true thespian. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> increases by [1]. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in Deception, Persuasion, Intimidation, and Performance <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.

You gain a bonus to Initiative equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>, you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Perception, and you can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>.
You gain a bonus to Initiative equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> and can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>.

Your Dexterity increases by 1, and you gain Proficiency with all bow types.

When you make bow attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage.

Piercing Shot and Hamstring Shot are harder for targets to resist and inflict their conditions for twice as long.
You have gained <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with all ranged weapons and <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> score has increased by [1].
When you make bow attacks within melee range, the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> do not have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.

<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_PiercingShot">Piercing Shot</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_HamstringShot">Hamstring Shot</LSTag> are harder for targets to resist and inflict their conditions for twice as long.

You gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_Charger_Attack">Charger: Weapon Attack</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_Charger_Push">Charger: Shove</LSTag>. You can only use Charger: Weapon Attack once per turn.

Let your speed intensify your onslaught. You can charge forward to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_Charger_Push">Shove</LSTag> a target or deal additional <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_Charger_Attack">Weapon Damage</LSTag> to it. You can only use Charger: Weapon Attack once per turn.
Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way. You add double your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to the damage done.

Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way. Your chances depend on your Athletics, and are higher if you're <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">hidden</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">invisible</LSTag>.
The shove distance depends on your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> and the target's weight.

When attacked while wielding a Finesse Weapon you're Proficient with, you can use a reaction to add your Proficiency Bonus to your Armour Class, possibly causing the attack to miss.

When you are holding a Finesse Weapon you're Proficient with in one hand and your off-hand is empty, your melee weapon attacks gain an Attack Roll bonus equal to your Proficiency Bonus and the number you need to roll a Critical Hit with them is reduced by 1.

Increase your Dexterity by 1.

When attacked while wielding a <LSTag Tooltip="Finesse">Finesse Weapon</LSTag> you're <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with, you can use a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">reaction</LSTag> to add your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> score is increased by 1.

When you are holding a Finesse Weapon you're Proficient with in one hand and your off-hand is empty, your melee weapon attacks gain an Attack Roll bonus equal to your Proficiency Bonus and the number you need to roll a Critical Hit with them is reduced by [1].

If your melee weapon has the Finesse and Versatile properties, you can balance it to remove the Versatile property from it.

Balance the melee weapon in your main hand for a duellist's hands, removing the <LSTag Tooltip="Versatile">Versatile</LSTag> property while binding it to your inventory. You may <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="CHT_Duelist_RemoveVersatile_Cancel">undo</LSTag> this at any time.
Weapon has the <LSTag Tooltip="Versatile">Versatile</LSTag> property removed and is bound to character's inventory.
Restore the <LSTag Tooltip="Versatile">Versatile</LSTag> property to your main hand weapon.
Weapon in main hand does not have the <LSTag Tooltip="Finesse">Finesse</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Versatile">Versatile</LSTag> properties.
Weapon in main hand is already balanced and has the <LSTag Tooltip="Versatile">Versatile</LSTag> property removed.
Weapon in main hand is not <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHT_DUELIST_REMOVED_VERSATILE">balanced</LSTag>.
You can only have a single balanced weapon active at a time and have already removed the <LSTag Tooltip="Versatile">Versatile</LSTag> property from another weapon.

You gain Two-Weapon Fighting.

You can dual wield even if your weapons aren't Light, and you gain a +1 bonus to Armour Class while wielding a melee weapon in each hand. You cannot dual-wield Two-Handed weapons.

Your Dexterity or Wisdom increases by 1, you gain a +1 bonus to Dexterity Saving Throws, and you gain Expertise in Sleight of Hand and Perception Checks.

You also gain Advantage on Perception Checks made to detect hidden objects and on Saving Throws made to avoid or resist traps. You gain Resistance to the damage dealt by traps.

You have <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in Sleight of Hand and Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>. You gain a +[1] bonus to Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, and your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> or or <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> score is increased by 1.

Your Constitution increases by 1.

In combat, if you start your turn with less than 60% hit points, you regain hit points equal to your Proficiency Bonus plus your Constitution Modifier.

You regain full hit points each time you take a Short Rest.

In combat, if you start your turn with less than 60% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, you regain hit points equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> plus your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>. You regain full hit points when you <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> score is increased by 1.

Your spells and attacks ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. When you deal damage of that type, deal 1 extra damage.

Your Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma increases by 1.

Spells you cast and attacks you make ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire damage. When you deal Fire damage, deal [1] extra damage. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> score is increased by 1.

Spells you cast and attacks you make ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Acid damage. When you deal Acid damage, deal [1] extra damage. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> score is increased by 1.

Spells you cast and attacks you make ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Cold damage. When you deal Cold damage, deal [1] extra damage. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> score is increased by 1.

Spells you cast and attacks you make ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Thunder damage. When you deal Thunder damage, deal [1] extra damage. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> score is increased by 1.
Spells you cast and attacks you make ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Lightning damage. When you deal Lightning damage, deal [1] extra damage.

When you land a Critical Hit or kill a target with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus action that turn.

Attacks with melee weapons you are Proficient with, and are wielding in both hands, can deal additional damage equal to double your Proficiency Bonus minus 1, at the cost of an Attack Roll penalty equal to your Proficiency Bonus. (You can toggle this on and off.)

When attacking with a melee weapon you are <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with and are wielding in both hands, you can deal additional damage equal to double your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> minus [1], at the cost of an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> penalty equal to your Proficiency Bonus.
You take a penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made with melee weapons wielded in both hands equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
You have a bonus to damage rolls you make with melee weapons wielded in both hands equal to double your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> minus 1.

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Heavy Armour. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> increases by 1 and you gain a +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> with the chosen ability.

You have <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Heavy Armour. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> score is increased by 1 and you gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> with the chosen ability.

Increase your Strength or Constitution by 1.

Incoming damage also decreases by an amount equal to your Proficiency Bonus, up to a maximum of 5, while you're wearing Heavy Armour.

While wearing Heavy Armour, reduce all incoming damage from all attacks by an amount equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>, up to a maximum of [1]. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> score is increased by [2].

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Light Armour. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> score increases by 1 and you gain a +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> with the chosen ability.

You have <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Light Armour. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> score is increased by 1 and you gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> with the chosen ability.

When a creature casts a spell within melee range of you, you can use a reaction to immediately make an attack against the caster.

You reduce all incoming damage from spells by an amount equal to your Proficiency Bonus and have Advantage on Saving Throws against spells.

Nearby enemies to you have Disadvantage on Concentration Saving Throws.

Enemies within [1] of you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. This can be toggled on and off.

You reduce all incoming damage from spells by an amount equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against spells.
Attack an enemy as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">reaction</LSTag> if they cast a spell near you.

You learn 2 cantrips, a Level 1 spell from the bard spell list, and gain a Level 1 spell slot. All spells use your normal spellcasting ability and you cannot upcast the 1st-level spell learned.

Your Charisma increases by 1.

You learn 2 cantrips, a Level 1 spell from the cleric spell list, and gain a Level 1 spell slot. All spells use your normal spellcasting ability and you cannot upcast the 1st-level spell learned.

Your Wisdom increases by 1.

You learn 2 cantrips, a Level 1 spell from the druid spell list, and gain a Level 1 spell slot. All spells use your normal spellcasting ability and you cannot upcast the 1st-level spell learned.

Your Wisdom increases by 1.

You learn 2 cantrips, a Level 1 spell from the sorcerer spell list, and gain a Level 1 spell slot. All spells use your normal spellcasting ability and you cannot upcast the 1st-level spell learned.

Your Charisma increases by 1.

You learn 2 cantrips, a Level 1 spell from the warlock spell list, and gain a Level 1 spell slot. All spells use your normal spellcasting ability and you cannot upcast the 1st-level spell learned.

Your Charisma increases by 1.

You learn 2 cantrips, a Level 1 spell from the wizard spell list, and gain a Level 1 spell slot. All spells use your normal spellcasting ability and you cannot upcast the 1st-level spell learned.

Your Intelligence increases by 1.

You have learned 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the bard spell list, and gained a Level 1 <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> score is increased by 1.

You have learned 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the cleric spell list, and gained a Level 1 <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> score is increased by 1.

You have learned 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the druid spell list, and gained a Level 1 <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> score is increased by 1.

You have learned 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the sorcerer spell list, and gained a Level 1 <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> score is increased by 1.

You have learned 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the warlock spell list, and gained a Level 1 <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> score is increased by 1.

You have learned 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the wizard spell list, and gained a Level 1 <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> score is increased by 1.

Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1.

You learn two manoeuvres from the Battle Master subclass and gain 3 Superiority Die to fuel them. You regain expended Superiority Dice after a Short or Long Rest.

You have learned two manoeuvres from the Battle Master subclass and gained 3 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to fuel them. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> score is increased by 1.

While wearing Medium Armour, you gain a +1 bonus to Armour Class, and at the start of combat you gain temporary hit points equal to your Proficiency Bonus. Medium Armour doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth Checks.

Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1.

When you wear Medium Armour, it doesn't impose <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Stealth <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>. Gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, and at the start of combat, you gain <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> while wearing Medium Armour. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> score is increased by 1.
Entity gained <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> equal to its <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

Your movement speed increases and cannot be reduced by Difficult Terrain or any other effects.

Enemies have Disadvantage on Opportunity Attacks against you.
Enemies have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag> against you.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> cannot be reduced by <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> or any other effects.

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Medium Armour and shields. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> score increases by 1 and you gain a +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> with the chosen ability.

You have <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Medium Armour and shields. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> score is increased by 1 and you gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> with the chosen ability.

You gain Musical Instrument Proficiency and Expertise in Performance and Acrobatics Checks.

You earn significantly more gold when you make a successful musical performance with an instrument, with the amount of gold you earn increasing with your Proficiency Bonus.

Your Dexterity or Charisma increases by 1.

You know how to play musical instruments and have <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in Performance and Acrobatics <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>. You earn significantly more gold when you make a successful musical performance with an instrument, with the amount of gold you earn increasing with your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> score is increased by 1.

When attacking with a glaive, halberd, pike, quarterstaff, spear, javelin, or trident, you can use a bonus action to attack with the butt of your weapon.

You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

When wielding a glaive, halberd, pike, quarterstaff, spear, javelin, or trident with both hands that has the Versatile property but not the Reach Weapon property, it gains the Reach property.
Sweep your polearm around, whacking a foe with the weapon's heavy haft.
Make an <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attack</LSTag> whenever a creature enters your reach.
Prerequisite: Must be wielding a glaive, halberd, pike, quarterstaff, spear, javelin, or trident.

When wielding a glaive, halberd, pike, quarterstaff, spear, or trident, you can make an <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attack</LSTag> when a target comes within range. When wielding an aforementioned weapon type with both hands that has the <LSTag Tooltip="Versatile">Versatile</LSTag> property but not the <LSTag Tooltip="Reach">Reach Weapon</LSTag> property, it gains the Reach property.
When attacking with a glaive, halberd, pike, quarterstaff, spear, javelin, or trident, you can use a bonus action to attack with the butt of your weapon and deal [1].
You increase an <LSTag Tooltip="Abilities">Ability</LSTag> by 1 and gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in that Ability's <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.

Your Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma increases by 1.

You learn 3 ritual spells and 2 utility cantrips of your choice.

Once per Short Rest, you can cast a ritual spell in combat without expending a spell slot.

When you take a Short Rest, you have a 20% chance to regain a level 1 spell slot. At levels 5 and 12, you gain separate 20% chances to regain a level 2 and level 3 spell slot respectively.

You only pay half the cost to learn spells from scrolls, becoming 25 gold pieces per spell level.

You have learned [1] <LSTag Tooltip="RitualSpell">ritual spells</LSTag> and [2] utility cantrips of your choice. You copy spell scrolls at half price. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> score is increased by 1.
You can cast a <LSTag Tooltip="RitualSpell">ritual spell</LSTag> in combat without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.

When you take a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>, you have a [1]% chance to regain a level 1 <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>. At level 5, you also gain a separate [2]% chance to regain a level 2 spell slot, and at level 12, you also gain a separate [3]% chance to regain a level 3 spell slot.
Entity's next <LSTag Tooltip="RitualSpell">ritual spells</LSTag> will be cast without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
Ritual Caster: Level 1 Spell Slot Recovered
Ritual Caster: Level 2 Spell Slot Recovered
Ritual Caster: Level 3 Spell Slot Recovered
You have recovered a level [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag> from <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="RitualCaster_SpellSlotRestoration_1">taking a short rest</LSTag>.

Your ranged weapon attacks do not receive penalties from High Ground Rules.

Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with can deal additional damage equal to double your Proficiency Bonus minus 1, at the cost of an Attack Roll penalty equal to your Proficiency Bonus. (You can toggle this on and off.)

Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with deal additional damage equal to double your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> minus [1], at the cost of an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> penalty equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

While you have a shield equipped, if a spell forces you to make a Dexterity Saving Throw, you shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage. On a failed Saving Throw, you only take half damage. On a successful Saving Throw, you don't take any damage.

Additionally, while you have a shield equipped, you take 1 less damage from all sources and you gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity Saving Throws while wielding a shield.

You can use Shield Blow as a bonus action.

While you are wearing a shield, all incoming damage is reduced by [1]. If a spell forces you to make a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, you only take half damage if you fail. On a successful Saving Throw, you don't take any damage.
You can use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ShieldBlow_Riposte">Shield Blow</LSTag> as a bonus action.
Strike an enemy with your shield. Your target must succeed a Strength <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or fall <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.

When struck by a melee attack, you can riposte against your attacker with the Walking Fortress, dealing [1] and knocking them Prone unless they succeed a Strength Saving Throw.

If you have Shield Master, your Shield Blow will also deal an additional [2].
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in 3 <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skills</LSTag> of your choice. You increase one Ability by 1.
You have gained <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in 3 <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skills</LSTag> of your choice, and one Ability of your choice is increased by 1.

You learn a cantrip.

Your Ranged Spell Attacks do not receive penalties from High Ground Rules, and the number you need to roll a Critical Hit with them is reduced by 1.

When you deal damage with a spell using an Attack Roll, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result. Spells that have multiple attacks do not benefit from this for subsequent attacks after the first.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="RangedSpellAttack">Ranged Spell Attacks</LSTag> do not receive penalties from <LSTag Tooltip="HighGroundRules">High Ground Rules</LSTag>, and the number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with them is reduced by 1.

When you deal damage with a spell using an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result. Spells that have multiple attacks do not benefit from this for subsequent attacks after the first.

The affected spells are:
Cantrips:
Bone Chill
Fire Bolt
Ray of Frost
Level 1 Spells:
Ice Knife
Guiding Bolt
Magic Missile
Melf's Acid Arrow
Ray of Sickness
Witch Bolt
Level 3 Spells:
Lightning Arrow

When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, you add a bonus equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> minus 1 to the damage and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.

When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, you add a bonus equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> minus [1] to the damage and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit point</LSTag> maximum increases by 2 for every level you have gained and you gain a +2 bonus to Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> score is increased by 1.

Your hit point maximum is increased by 2 for every level you have gained and you gain a +2 bonus to Constitution Saving Throws.

Your Constitution increases by 1.

You gain Proficiency with all weapons, and you can choose a weapon Fighting Style. You deal 1 additional damage with weapon attacks.

Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1.

You have gained <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with all weapons and a weapon Fighting Style of your choice. You deal [1] additional damage with weapon attacks. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> score is increased by 1.
Choose a Fighting Style to specialize in.
